text: If you are just looking to access the `/collector/v3/graphql` endpoint via private app, that is something we are still working on. For the moment, you can only access that endpoint via api key.

I'm trying to set some default form values for my page based on the row from a hubdb table. I found this support question for setting default values for text fields:
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Dynamic-Default-Values/m-p/343163>
but I cannot figure out how to alter a radio button fields. I've tried with the ID, css attribute selectors, I just keep getting various js errors as if it cant change the property. Anyone have any ideas?
